title: IR-2024-001 Memory Capture
summary: Memory snapshot triaged for possible credential theft on workstation 07.

attachments.title: Initial triage notes
attachments.description: Highlights suspicious processes from the memory capture.
attachments.body:
Reviewed Volatility pslist output; rundll32 -> powershell chain observed.
Recommend string extraction for injection artifacts.

attachments.title: Volatility triage summary
attachments.description: Text export of notable findings from volatility workflow.

title: IR-2024-002 Exfiltration Review
summary: Outbound data movement detected via email and cloud sync utilities.

attachments.title: Containment checklist
attachments.description: Steps executed with messaging security during incident triage.
attachments.body:
1. Disabled outbound email for account jordan.miles.
2. Blocked storage.sync-cloud.example at proxy edge.
3. Scheduled DLP forensic pull for impacted endpoints.

attachments.title: Exfil event timeline
attachments.description: CSV export from proxy and DLP telemetry.
